Info Source: http://www.cftc.gov/PressRoom/PressReleases/pr6007-11

Description: Bunge North America Inc. agreed to a $13.9 million settlement covering 12 plants in eight states to resolve allegations that the company violated the Clean Air Act by making major modifications that increased emissions without obtaining pre-construction permits and without complying with applicable standards of performance for new air pollution sources.
Agency: Justice Department Environment and Natural Resources Division
Info Source: https://www.justice.gov/archive/opa/pr/2006/October/06_enrd_727.html

Description: Bunge agreed to pay $1.875 million -- consisting of a $625,000 fine and $1.25 million in spending on environmental projects -- to eight states and the federal government to resolve alleged environmental violations at 12 processing facilities. This was part of a larger $13.9 million settlement announced by the Justice Department; see the Violation Tracker entry at https://violationtracker.goodjobsfirst.org/violation-tracker/-bunge-north-america-inc
Info Source: https://web.archive.org/web/20071020214935/http://www.illinoisattorneygeneral.gov/pressroom/2006_10/20061031.html
